titles.title: Native Hawaiian Housing Assistance Act of 1997
To provide Federal housing assistance to Native Hawaiians.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services

bill.summary: 2/6/1997--Introduced. Native Hawaiian Housing Assistance Act of 1997 - Amends the Native American Housing Assistance and Self-Determination Act of 1996 to establish a Native Hawaiian affordable housing block grant program. Authorizes appropriations. Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1992 to authorize Native Hawaiian housing loan guarantees. Authorizes appropriations.
